1.0.name: wordpress/userecho
1.0.description:
UserEcho - this is a new approach for working with clients their wishes ideas and requests. Allows you to quickly create a comfortable environment to communicate with users.

UserEcho Wordpress plugin - allow easy to UserEcho widget to your blog.

UserEcho is a web-app that provides a useful way for companies to solicit feedback from customers online. Businesses of all sizes can get feedback from their clients, customers, and followers, and then respond directly to people who submit particularly interesting comments or insightful ideas. Companies that use UserEcho can interact with clients directly and potentially get help generating a few innovative business ideas in the process.

In addition to being able to leave feedback, customers can also vote on the suggestions left by other users. As a business owner, you can then go in and quickly see which ideas have received the most votes as a way to decide which new features to impl
